price: Ǹjẹ́ Ẹni tí Ó ṣe ìyẹn kò níí ní agbára láti jí àwọn òkú dìde bí?
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alaysa dhālika biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā
